column4: there is any ubuntu dis or any linux dist at all that can be ran as live cd and , that allow doing changes ( cut \ delete \ copy \ create ... files and folders ) on NTFS driver ? kind of rescue cd , if there is with GUI (kde or GNOME or XFCE ) it prefered ?
the rugular ubuntu desktop cd will let you do that
sure it does, just make sure the ntfs drive is mounted and run gksudo nautilus
